instructions: In Camera, tap the thumbnail image in the lower-left corner. Swipe left or right to see the photos you ve taken recently. Tap the screen to show or hide the controls. Tap All Photos to see all your photos and videos saved in Photos.
While viewing a photo, tap the Share button . Select an option such as Mail, Messages, or Print. (You may need to swipe left on the bottom row of options to reveal Print.)
